creator: mona_chem@lycos.com
text:
Hi I created a logging component using Log4j. I am calling the component from 
EJB components. It is working fine in windows 2k. When running in OS/390 it is 
giving following error.
Please help in this, 
----------------------------------------------------------

to a "org.apache.log4j.Appender" variable.

creator: ceki@apache.org
text:
This is not a bug. Search for "object is not assignable" in the log4j mailing 
lists.
